name: Cosmic Keyboarding
description:
Cosmic Keyboarding is a puzzle platformer in which you must place the keys on a keyboard in order to traverse the game, allowing you to create your own levels and solutions to puzzles. 

Made in Game Maker Studio 2, Cosmic Keyboarding features a pho-3d perspective and sprite stacking in order to create much of its art and assets.

Game Music: https://www.free-stock-music.com/search.php?keyword=space

Thanks for checking out the game!
